growthexperiments-confirmemail-emailhelp: Es ist eine E-Mail-Adresse erforderlich, um dein Benutzerkonto wiederherzustellen, falls du dein Passwort verlieren solltest.
growthexperiments-confirmemail-emailwarn: Sieh bitte nach einer E-Mail von uns, um deine Adresse zu verifizieren.
growthexperiments-confirmemail-confirm-s: Willkommen bei {{SITENAME}}: Bestätige bitte deine E-Mail-Adresse
growthexperiments-confirmemail-confirm-b: {{GENDER:$2|Hi}} $2, Thanks for adding an email to your {{SITENAME}} account, registered from IP address $1. Please click on the button below to confirm this as the email address you'd like to link to your account "$2": $3 Note: this confirmation code expires at $4. Thanks, {{SITENAME}} ---- To cancel the email address confirmation (because you did not register the account or for any other reason), click on this cancellation link: $5

{{GENDER:$2|Hi}} $2,

Thanks for adding an email to your {{SITENAME}} account, registered from IP address $1.

Please click on the link below to confirm this as the email address you'd like to link to your account "$2":

$3

Note: this confirmation code expires at $4.

Thanks,

{{SITENAME}}

----

To cancel the email address confirmation (because you did not register the account or for any other reason), click on this cancellation link:
